TextLibrary.Text: Well, that's the Horned Citadel alright. I quickly flew over to see what I could find.
Well, that's the Horned Citadel alright. I quickly flew over to see what I could find.

Well, that's the Horned Citadel alright. I quickly flew over to see what I could find.
Did you see Minogoth? Or the Skull of Sartek?
Did you see Minogoth? Or the Skull of Sartek?
Did you see Minogoth? Or the Skull of Sartek?
Did you see Minogoth? Or the Skull of Sartek?
I saw both. And you're not going to get to one without encountering the other.
I saw both. And you're not going to get to one without encountering the other.

Alright, then. We'd better prepare for battle.
